summary: Evaluate an animation and FX effects of this unusual gauntlet.
descriptionHtml:
[color=lightblue][b]Name: Animated Gauntlet (prototype)[/b][/color]
Data: 2014/02/15
Version: 1.00
Author: Anton


[heading][color=yellow]Description:[/color][/heading]
This mod add to the game an animated gauntlet for left hand.
Gauntlet can be activated by taking "combat stance" (taking a weapon).
For now there only a little bit of armor is provided by this gauntlet, nothing more.

(my model and textures maybe far from perfect, but they are pretty enough to evaluate the idea itself)
(maybe late i will make it better, but i will be very grateful if someone would like to help me with this task)


[heading][color=yellow]Goal of this mod:[/color][/heading]
- to impress users with unusual way to make a cloth
- to interest modmakers to create similar stuff
(i will release my tools and short instruction how to make such things a little bit late)

[heading][color=yellow]How to get it:[/color][/heading]
For now only with console: "player.additem xx000D62 1".
(where "хх" - number of this mod in your load order)
or use console command "[color=lightblue][b]help Animated[/b][/color]" to get whole number (from ARTO object)

[heading][color=yellow]Requirements:[/color][/heading]
none

[heading][color=yellow]Incompatibilities:[/color][/heading]
none
(mod has only its own resources so no conflicts must be possible)

[heading][color=yellow]Install:[/color][/heading]
You can use any mod manager you like to install this mod, or just unpack all files to "..Data" folder of the game.
(load order is doesn't matter)

[heading][color=yellow]Uninstall:[/color][/heading]
Take off the gauntlet.
Wait while all effects has been finished and it disappears.
Save the game
Delete all installed files of this mod.

[heading][color=yellow]Issues:[/color][/heading]
- if you have a cloth in slot "36" (Ring), it will be taken off from your character when you choose this gauntlet
- common gloves and gauntlets will not be taken off automatically (because their slot hasn't used)

[heading][color=yellow]Permission:[/color][/heading]
Don't change anything and don't upload it to another sites without my permission, please.
